src:
Zagorela elektro omarica
04 Nov 2019, 19:40 by Danijel Cek

Danes, nekaj minut pred pol deveto dopoldne, je v trgovini Kraški kotiček v Cankarjevi ulici v Sežani zagorela elektro omarica.



Foto: ZGRS Sežana

SEŽANA > Plameni so uničili omarico in prostor okoli nje. Sežanski poklicni in prostovoljni gasilci so ogenj hitro pogasili ter vse prostore in ostrešje pregledali s termo kamero. Ob tem so očistili zamašene žlebove, prezračili objekt in popravili kritino.
text:
Burned electric cabinet
04 Nov 2019, 18:40 by Danijel Cek

Today, just before half past nine in the morning, an electric locker was set on fire at the Kraški corner shop in Cankarjeva Street in Sežana.



Photo: ZGRS Sežana

SEZANA> Flames destroyed the cabinet and the space around it. Nursing professional and volunteer firefighters quickly extinguished the fire and inspected all rooms and roofs with a thermal camera. At the same time, they cleared the clogged gutters, ventilated the building and repaired the roof.
